translation: The fourfold caste has been created by Me according to the differentiation of Guna and Karma; though I am the author of it, know Me as non-doer and immutable.
commentary: 4.13 Chaturvarnyam the fourfold caste? Maya be Me? Srishtam has been created? According to the differentiation of Guna and Karma? his thereof? the doer the author? Even also? Mam Me? Viddhi know? Akartaram nondoer? The infinitive is immutable.Commentary The four castes (Brahmana? Kshatriya? Vaishya and Sudra) are classified according to the differentiation of Guna and Karma. In a Brahmana? Sattva
